p: The above proteases belong to different classes according to the catalytic amino acid. While the SARS-CoV-2 main protease is a cysteine protease [ 20, 22], the HIV-1 enzyme is an aspartate protease [ 20, 23]. The human drug target renin also belongs to this family. On the other hand, the HCV protease [ 24] as well as the human protease DPP-4 [ 25], the coagulation Factor Xa [ 26] and thrombin [ 27] are serine proteases, while the angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) belongs to the metalloproteinase family [ 20, 28].
